name: Garlic Parmesan And Herb Pita Chips 🥗
description: Indulge in a symphony of flavors with these garlic, parmesan, and herb pita chips that are bursting with rich, savory notes. Aromatic and delectable, they'll have your taste buds singing in perfect harmony.
instructions: Slice pita bread into eighths and spread chips out on a parchment paper-lined baking sheet.
In a small bowl combine olive oil, Parmesan cheese, garlic, and parsley, and brush onto both sides of the chips.
Bake for 10-12 minutes until golden and crispy.
